argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-cht | |- theta = ( x e. RR |-> sum_ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ( log ` p ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ppifi | |- ( x e. RR -> ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) e. Fin ) |
| 3 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) C_ Prime |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( x e. RR /\ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ) -> p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ( x e. RR /\ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ) -> p e. Prime ) |
| 6 |  | #P_prmnn | |- ( p e. Prime -> p e. NN ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( x e. RR /\ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ) -> p e. NN ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_nnrpd | |- ( ( x e. RR /\ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ) -> p e. RR+ ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_relogcld | |- ( ( x e. RR /\ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ) -> ( log ` p ) e. RR ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_fsumrecl | |- ( x e. RR -> sum_ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ( log ` p ) e. RR ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_fmpti | |- theta : RR --> RR |
